articles.Title: Billy Hallowell: Trump deserves compassion — not death wishes — after being stricken with coronavirus
articles.Author: Billy Hallowell
articles.Description: President Trump’s hospitalization Friday night with COVID-19 has prompted get-well wishes by both Democrats and Republicans — but also hateful messages by some of the president’s opponents on social media expressing wishes for his death.

articles.Title: Trump's politics of sickness boomerangs back
articles.Author: Opinion by John Avlon
articles.Description: After President Donald Trump was hospitalized for Covid-19 last Friday, John Avlon writes that Trump's tactics to downplay the gruesome pandemic is backfiring at him and the Republican Party.
articles.Content:

articles.Title: The White House medical team isn't giving straight answers on Trump's health
articles.Author: Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.Description: The White House physician, surrounded by a group of other doctors, emerged just before noon on Saturday from Walter Reed medical center to give a sunny update on President Donald Trump's condition after his positive Covid-19 diagnosis.
articles.Content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!
